name: mode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the mode or course of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the SmartThings device that needs to change mode or course.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to change mode or course.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode that the SmartThings device should switch to.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The temperature setting for the SmartThings device.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature for the SmartThings device.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration for the mode or course change.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight setting for the SmartThings device.

parameters.name: weightUnit
parameters.description: The unit of weight for the SmartThings device.
